- Sim-to-real: Getting from the
virtual world to the physical world.
Say you're an astronaut, you don't train
for outer space by going into outer space.
You find a simulator, like a pool,

that can simulate the
experience of micro-gravity.

But a swimming pool isn't
exactly outer space.
The same thing happens with DeepRacer.
In the virtual world, it tries to emulate
everything in the physical world:
gravity, friction, drift.
